channel.title: Comments on: What is a life?

item.title: By: Does Believing the "First Kiss" Video Mean You're Stupid?
item.dc:creator: Does Believing the "First Kiss" Video Mean You're Stupid?
item.description: […] Free Association talked about this crisis of connection in their discussion of the self-help industry, and I think their analysis applies to our desire to love as well. There is a limit to our love, […]

item.title: By: The Anaheim Anti-Police Riot, A Love Story | Orchestrated Pulse
item.dc:creator: The Anaheim Anti-Police Riot, A Love Story | Orchestrated Pulse
item.description: [...] neighbors joined neighbors, and the whole community found themselves in the street together. “If you want real insight into love, participate in a riot”, and love took the streets Saturday afternoon in Anaheim. Love pushed a dumpster and trash can [...]
